alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 8:24PM MST until February 16 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Light snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to a half inch possible. * WHERE...Boulder and the western suburbs of Denver, and Denver. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roads will make travel hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
